sentences.sContent: It takes about 150 days to grow out a full length fingernail.
sentences.sContent_eng: It takes about 150 days to grow out a full length fingernail.
sentences.sCn: 大约150天的时间就可以长一个完整的指甲出来。

sentences.sContent: As I turned on my side I noticed pieces of fingernail, bits of skin and hair on the lift carpet.
sentences.sContent_eng: As I turned on my side I noticed pieces of fingernail, bits of skin and hair on the lift carpet.
sentences.sCn: 当我转身侧卧时，注意到电梯的地毯上有零星的指甲、皮肤碎屑和头发。

sentences.sContent: The top of the box was sealed with wide brown parcel tape, Jacob managed to get his fingernail under the end and peeled off the tape in one go.
sentences.sContent_eng: The top of the box was sealed with wide brown parcel tape, Jacob managed to get his fingernail under the end and peeled off the tape in one go.
sentences.sCn: 箱子的顶端是用褐色的包裹胶带封起来的，雅各布用指甲把胶带的一头抠起来，一下子把胶带整个扯开。

words.tran: 指法；用指摸弄；手指弹奏；指法符号；细绒线
用手指触摸；指出；谴责；用指弹奏（finger的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: the hard flat part that covers the top end of your finger
